column2: Securitron Mk 2
column3: 电子保安 Mk 2

column2: Monorail VIP Pass
column3: 单轨电车VIP通行证

column2: Lucky 38 Casino
column3: 幸运38赌场

column2: Freeside
column3: 自由之城

column2: The Strip
column3: 长街

column2: Lucky 38
column3: 幸运38

column2: GREETING
column3: 问好

column2: Congratulations, pardner! The boss has instructed me to comp you to the High-Roller Suite!
column3: 祝贺你，伙计！老板已经跟我打过招呼了，你可以免费入住高档套房！

column2: You can bring your friends, too! Be like a little clubhouse for the gang you put together!
column3: 你也可以带你的朋友来！就把它当成你们的小型聚会场所吧！

column2: Just bear in mind, you're the only one gets to see the boss! Any friends you got, they can wait in the suite.
column3: 但是记住，只有你可以见老板！如果你带朋友来，可以让他们先在房间里等。

column2: Enjoy the digs, pardner! They're plenty fancy!
column3: 好好享受吧，伙计！这套房绝对够梦幻！

column2: {attacking player who has betrayed House}You low-down snake! I wish {Ida}I'd have left you in the ground to rot!
column3: {attacking player who has betrayed House}你这条卑鄙的毒蛇！我当初就该让你烂在土里！

column2: {starting attack}Draw!
column3: {starting attack}掏枪吧！

column2: Submit to a credit check or present your passport before proceeding to the gate. Trespassers will be shot.
column3: 请缴纳保证金，或出示通行证，非法闯入者将被击毙。

column2: It was Curtis. He's in the Legion. I can prove he tried to blow up the monorail.
column3: 是柯蒂斯干的。他是军团的人。我能证明他企图炸毁列车。

column2: Curtis? He's been in the NCR long before our conflict with the Legion. There's just no way...
column3: 柯蒂斯？他在我们和军团发生冲突以前就加入NCR了呀。这不可能……

column2: I hope you're mistaken, but somehow I don't think so. It'd explain a lot. This is much worse than anyone expected. There could be others, too.
column3: 希望是你搞错了，但我又总觉得不是。因为这样很多事情就说得通了。看来情况比料想的还糟。我们之中可能还有更多像柯蒂斯这样的人。

column2: You've done everything that was asked of you. You have my personal thanks for this, and I'll make sure you receive the credit you deserve.
column3: 你完成了我交给你的所有任务。我代表自己由衷地向你表示感谢，我也保证你一定会得到相应的奖励。

column2: Sure, here you go.
column3: 当然，给你。

column2: Have you been to Mick & Ralph's yet? They run a store just down the street, and sell some things you might not expect.
column3: 你去过米克与拉尔夫的杂货店吗？他们在街那边经营一家商店，卖一些你想都想不到的东西。

column2: No way your materials and expenses require that. How about half?
column3: 材料和成本不可能要这么多钱。一半怎么样？

column2: [SUCCEEDED] Hah! I like your style, kid, but the best I can do is meet you halfway. 375 caps, and we can call it a deal.
column3: [成功] 哈，我喜欢你的风格，孩子，但我可没法降太多。375个瓶盖，咱们就成交。.

column2: [FAILED] Heh, who are you shitting?
column3: [失败] 呵，你开什么玩笑？ ?

column2: I appreciate your brass, but 500 is the price. Take it or leave it.
column3: 我欣赏你的胆量，但500块钱是一口价。不要拉倒。

column2: [SUCCEEDED] Hah! I like your style, kid, but the best I can do is meet you halfway. 375 caps, and we can call it a deal.
column3: [成功] 哈，我喜欢你的风格，孩子，但我可没法降太多。375个瓶盖，咱们就成交。.

column2: [FAILED] Heh, who are you shitting?
column3: [失败] 呵，你开什么玩笑？ ?

column2: I appreciate your brass, but 500 is the price. Take it or leave it.
column3: 我欣赏你的胆量，但500块钱是一口价。不要拉倒。

column2: <Speech>
column3: <口才>

column2: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Yeah, I've got a little side business going, but what I'm about to share with you does not leave this room, eh?
column3: [成功] 好吧，我的确有做一些特殊买卖，但我接下来说的话，我不希望其他人知道，懂吗？

column2: Over the years, I've gradually perfected my craft to the point of perfection. No one can distinguish between my work and the real thing.
column3: 几年来，我一直在改进工艺。没人能分辨出我做的东西和真品之间有什么区别。

column2: What I'm referring to is passports. If you've got the caps, I can whip up a Strip passport which will fool even the most well-trained eye.
column3: 我指的是通行证。如果你有瓶盖的话，我可以帮你造一张长街的通行证，绝对能骗过任何专家的眼睛。

column2: A resourceful fellow such as yourself must have something on the side.
column3: 像你这样八面玲珑的人，一定有些别的门路吧。

column2: [FAILED] Wow, you're a real wordsmith there, bub. Sorry, talk to the leaders of Freeside if you want the deal.
column3: [失败] 哇，你还真是挺胆大的啊，朋友。抱歉，如果你要做这桩买卖，得先去找自由城的老大谈。

column2: Let me in on the action!
column3: 让我也掺一脚吧！

column2: [SUCCEEDED] All right. Yeah, I've got a little side business going, but what I'm about to share with you does not leave this room, eh?
column3: [成功] 好吧，我的确有做一些特殊买卖，但我接下来说的话，我不希望其他人知道，懂吗？

column2: Over the years, I've gradually perfected my craft to the point of perfection. No one can distinguish between my work and the real thing.
column3: 几年来，我一直在改进工艺。没人能分辨出我做的东西和真品之间有什么区别。

column2: What I'm referring to is passports. If you've got the caps, I can whip up a Strip passport which will fool even the most well-trained eye.
column3: 我指的是通行证。如果你有瓶盖的话，我可以帮你造一张长街的通行证，绝对能骗过任何专家的眼睛。

column2: A resourceful fellow such as yourself must have something on the side.
column3: 像你这样八面玲珑的人，一定有些别的门路吧。

column2: [FAILED] Wow, you're a real wordsmith there, bub. Sorry, talk to the leaders of Freeside if you want the deal.
column3: [失败] 哇，你还真是挺胆大的啊，朋友。抱歉，如果你要做这桩买卖，得先去找自由城的老大谈。

column2: Let me in on the action!
column3: 让我也掺一脚吧！

column2: What do I need to do to get in?
column3: 我需要什么才能进去？

column2: If you are unable to meet the minimum balance requirement, an official passport is an acceptable alternative.
column3: 如果你无法满足最低资产要求，也可以向我们出示由官方派发的通行证。

column2: [Passport] I've got a passport.
column3: [通行证]我有通行证。

column2: Thank you, sir. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，先生。你可以通过了。

column2: [Counterfeit] I've got a passport.
column3: [伪造证件] 我有通行证。

column2: Thank you, madam. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，女士。你可以通过了。

column2: [Counterfeit] I've got a passport.
column3: [伪造证件] 我有通行证。

column2: Thank you, sir. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，先生。你可以通过了。

column2: Thank you, madam. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，女士。你可以通过了。

column2: I'll submit to the credit check. <2,000 caps required.>
column3: 我愿意提供保证金。<需要2000瓶盖 。>

column2: Thank you, sir. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，先生。你可以通过了。

column2: Thank you, madam. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，女士。你可以通过了。

column2: I'm sorry, but your balance does not meet the minimum balance.
column3: 抱歉，你的资产数量无法满足最低要求。

column2: I want to buy a passport. <2,000 caps required.>
column3: 我想买张通行证<需要2000瓶盖 。>

column2: Thank you, sir. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，先生。你可以通过了。

column2: Thank you, madam. You may proceed.
column3: 谢谢，女士。你可以通过了。

column2: Please return when you have the sufficient caps or a passport.
column3: 请在你拥有足够瓶盖或通行证时回来

column2: Goodbye.
column3: 再见。

column2: Move along.
column3: 走吧。

column2: The House Has Gone Bust!
column3: 庄家爆点咯！

column2: Mr. House is dead. His grand dreams for New Vegas will never be realized.
column3: 豪斯先生已经死了。他关于新维加斯的美梦再也无法实现了。

column2: You have irrevocably disconnected Mr. House from the Lucky 38's mainframe computers.
column3: 你已经让豪斯先生和幸运38的主机断开链接，没法反悔了。

column2: The House Always Wins, I
column3: 庄家多得利I

column2: Failure.
column3: 失败。

column2: Talk to Mr. House at the Lucky 38.
column3: 到幸运38与豪斯先生交谈。

column2: Bring the Platinum Chip to Mr. House.
column3: 将白金芯片带给豪斯先生。

column2: Recover the Platinum Chip at the Fort.
column3: 从城堡取回白金芯片。

column2: Deliver the Platinum Chip to Mr. House.
column3: 将白金芯片给豪斯先生。

column2: Go to the basement of the Lucky 38.
column3: 前往幸运38的地下室。

column2: Observe as Mr. House upgrades Securitrons.
column3: 见证豪斯先生升级安保系统。

column2: Return to Mr. House.
column3: 回到豪斯先生处。

column2: (Optional) Talk to Mr. House again if you want to work for him.
column3: (可选)如果你还愿意为豪斯先生效命，就和他谈谈。

column2: The House Always Wins, II
column3: 庄家多得利II

column2: Use the Platinum Chip to open the secret bunker at Fortification Hill.
column3: 使用白金芯片打开堡垒山下的秘密基地。

column2: Enter the secret bunker.
column3: 进入秘密地下工厂。

column2: Upgrade Mr. House's secret Securitron army.
column3: 升级豪斯先生的安保部队。

column2: Report back to Mr. House for further instructions.
column3: 回去报告豪斯先生，获得更多任务的情报。

column2: (Optional) Change your mind and upgrade Mr. House's secret Securitron army.
column3: (可选)转变想法，给豪斯先生的秘密安保部队安装升级程序。

column2: Wild Card: Change in Management
column3: 百搭牌：换人坐庄

column2: Quest complete. Yes Man installed at Lucky 38, in charge of upgraded Securitrons on Strip.
column3: 任务完成。好好先生在幸运38安置了下来，并控制了长街的安保部队。

column2: Kill or Disable Mr. House.
column3: 杀死豪斯先生，或者让他瘫痪。

column2: Install Yes Man's A.I. in the Lucky 38's mainframe.
column3: 在幸运38的主机中安装好好先生的人工智能。

column2: Meet Yes Man at the Lucky 38.
column3: 在幸运38和好好先生碰面。

column2: Recover the Platinum Chip from Benny at the Fort.
column3: 从城堡取回白金芯片。

column2: Recover the Platinum Chip from Benny.
column3: 从本尼那里取回白金芯片。

column2: Deliver the Platinum Chip to Mr. House so he can upgrade his defensive systems.
column3: 将白金芯片交给豪斯先生，让他升级防御系统。

column2: Go the basement of the Lucky 38.
column3: 前往幸运38的地下室。

column2: Observe upgrading of Securitrons.
column3: 见证安保系统升级。

column2: Return to Yes Man.
column3: 回到好好先生处。

column2: Obtain a Lucky 38 VIP Keycard.
column3: 获得幸运38的VIP卡。

column2: Where to, Pardner?
column3: 要去哪儿，搭档？
